name: Business Plan Pro Document
summary: Learn about .BPDX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: BPDX files are .ZIP files that contain .XML data files and an .XLS Excel workbook that is used for making the financial calculations.
NOTE: Older versions of Business Plan Pro use the .BPD extension.

description: Project file created by Business Plan Pro, an application used for creating business plans; saves information such as the executive summary, company type, market analyses, investments, and financial targets; used in the process of compiling a business plan.
